tool_description: Profanity & Toxicity Detection for User-Generated Content - Language Understanding API designed to detect profanities, toxicities, severe toxicities, obscene texts, insults, threats, and identity hate
name: Profanity & Toxicity Detection for User-Generated Content
title: Profanity & Toxicity Detection for User-Generated Content
tool_name: Profanity & Toxicity Detection for User-Generated Content

api_list.name: process
api_list.description:
This endpoint detects profanities, toxicities, severe toxicities, obscene texts, insults, threats, and identity hate in a given text.
The input "text" is required, the input "title" is optional.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: You idiot! I will find where you live and kick you ass!
